ENDIF()
ADD_CUSTOM_COMMAND(
TARGET splash
COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy ${_splashSrcFile} ${_splashDstFile}
)
INSTALL(FILES ${_splashDstFile} DESTINATION share/${PACKAGE}/textures RENAM
E ${_splashFile})
